pr_title: DG-715: Change telemetry cluster label names

timeline.message: DG-715: Change telemetry cluster label names

timeline.bodyText: Can you rename the constant to RESOURCE_LABEL_CLUSTER_ID to RESOURCE_LABEL_KAFKA_CLUSTER_ID, and add RESOURCE_LABEL_CLUSTER_ID.  We can still keep RESOURCE_GROUP_ID in the metrics context.
timeline.author: xiaodongdu

timeline.bodyText: Can we still keep RESOURCE_LABEL_GROUP_ID in the context and at the same time add RESOURCE_LABEL_CLUSTER_ID
timeline.author: xiaodongdu
